Classes/StateBox.html.name: StateBox
Classes/StateBox.html.abstract: A type to box non-class StateTypes in classes for better ObjC portability. Curretnly this is only used to box states in the userInfo object of an Notification.

Enums/GauntletNotification.html#/s:8Gaun.name: willTransition
Enums/GauntletNotification.html#/s:8Gaun.abstract: Name used to post notifications before transitions when GAUNTLET_POST_TEST_NOTIFICATIONS is defined in the environment.

Enums/GauntletNotification.html#/s:8Gaun.name: didTransition
Enums/GauntletNotification.html#/s:8Gaun.abstract: Name used to post notifications after transitions when GAUNTLET_POST_TEST_NOTIFICATIONS is defined in the environment.

Enums/GauntletNotification.html.name: GauntletNotification
Enums/GauntletNotification.html.abstract: Holds notification name constants. A client may want to define GAUNTLET_POST_TEST_NOTIFICATIONS and observe notificationas with these names when testing.

Classes/StateMachine/StateTransitionDele.name: didTransition
Classes/StateMachine/StateTransitionDele.abstract: Delegate closure that gets called whenever StateMachine successfully transitions from one state to another.

Classes/StateMachine/StateTransitionDele.name: StateTransitionDelegates
Classes/StateMachine/StateTransitionDele.abstract: Delegate tasks of StateMachine. Consumers can assign implementations to respond to lifecycle events.

Classes/StateMachine.html#/s:8Gauntlet12.name: delegates
Classes/StateMachine.html#/s:8Gauntlet12.abstract: Consumers can assign implementations to protperties of delegates to respond to lifecycle events.

Classes/StateMachine.html#/s:8Gauntlet12.name: state
Classes/StateMachine.html#/s:8Gauntlet12.abstract: The current state of the state machine. Read-only.

Classes/StateMachine.html#/s:8Gauntlet12.name: init(initialState:)
Classes/StateMachine.html#/s:8Gauntlet12.abstract: Initializes the state machine with the given initial state.

Classes/StateMachine.html#/s:8Gauntlet12.name: queue(_:)
Classes/StateMachine.html#/s:8Gauntlet12.abstract: Use this method to transition states. It first take the given state and determine its validity via StateType.shouldTransitionFrom(_,to:). If it is, it transitions the machine to it, calling transformationHandler once complete. If not, the given state is silently ignored.

Protocols/StateType.html#/s:8Gauntlet9St.name: shouldTransition(to:)
Protocols/StateType.html#/s:8Gauntlet9St.abstract: Defines what it means for a transition between states to be legal or illegal.

Protocols/StateType.html.name: StateType
Protocols/StateType.html.abstract: Describes the primary unit of state in a StateMachine. In theory, this could be any type capable of calculating whether a transition between two instances of itself is legal. In practice, it is always an enum:
